law.catch_line: Proprietary schools that offer CDL training governed by this chapter -- Exceptions.
law.text:
All proprietary schools located or doing business in this state that offer CDL driver training shall be governed by the provisions of this chapter, except for matters governing:
The curriculum which shall be established by the board in consultation with the Department of Kentucky State Police and the Kentucky Community and Technical College System; and
The inspection of CDL driver training school facilities which shall be under the authority of the Department of Kentucky State Police pursuant to KRS 165A.475 and 332.095.
law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 175, effective June 26, 2007. -- Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 280, sec. 2, effective April 9, 2002.
